Information for First Sentence:
CAPIOX Hemoconcentrators are used during cardiopulmonary bypass to remove excess fluid from the blood to maintain proper hematocrit and protein concentration and enable reinfusion of blood remaining in the circuit after bypass.

Information about the second sentence of the product description:
The membrane is composed of polysulfone and is designed to achieve high ultrafiltration rate (UFR) for efficient blood concentration in a short time, while restricting removal of albumin.

Information about the body sentences of the product description:
The inlet blood port designed to ensure smooth blood flow and reduce possible stagnation, and prevent thrombus formation. The filters have a low priming volume intended to keep it compact and light, consequently requiring little storage space and offering easy disposal. No-rinse hollow fibers are designed to enable quick
set up even during the operation. Additionally, the entire housing, including blood
ports, is transparent designed for easy visual checking.

Be unbiased and state all of the facts. Include "designed to" and "intended to" when stating claims. Just write the product description. Do not repeat features you have explained already.
